response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value for us, and we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. Considering its worth to us and its potential benefits to you, we are offering you the chance to own it at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is designed to ensure both parties benefit from this transaction. Please let us know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer, and we'll be happy to guide you through the next steps. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
